meanings.definition: A jeweled crown or headband worn as a symbol of sovereignty.
meanings.sent1: The queen's diadems sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She placed the diadems on her head before the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The diadems looked like tiny sparkling stars on her head.
meanings.sent4: Her diadems shone brighter than any other crown in the room.
meanings.sent5: The diadems added a touch of royalty to her appearance.

meanings.sent1: He diadems the winner of the competition with a laurel wreath.
meanings.sent2: The king diadems his son as the prince of the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: She diadems her cat with a tiny tiara for fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist diadems the statue with a golden halo.
meanings.sent5: The chef diadems the masterpiece cake with edible jewels.
